description:
Chopper and Bepo look back on Trafalgar Law’s life. They explain how he met Luffy, formed an alliance, and traveled to Punk Hazard, Dressrosa, and the Land of Wano to take down the Emperors of the Sea.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Project to Fully Enjoy! `Surgeon of Death` Trafalgar Law
Dai Tannou Kikaku! "Shi no Gekai" Trafalgar Law
Projekt für einen talentierten Mann! – "Chirurg des Todes", Trafalgar Law
Un projet à savourer. Trafalgar Law, le Chirurgien de la mort !
大堪能企画! "死の外科医" トラファルガー・ロー
